virtual.title: VR contents developed by redefining the motions associated with the controller in virtual reality by the defined product use procedures can be used as virtual training and promotional materials for employees.
virtual.context: Following the completion of the visualization in UNREAL, we apply the VR device template and provide further essential functionalities such as teleport and menu addition. If required, video (MP4 FORMAT) can be included, and it is exported in EXE format via project packaging to provide a service that can use VR even on a PC without the software installed
